description:
The jQuery jNotify plug-in is an unobtrusive notification system for web-based applications. Use jNotify to inform users when specific actions have completed on your siteâ€“such as when an AJAX operation complete.
The jNotify plug-in is designed to replace code where you may have previously used the JavaScript alert() function to provide feedback to the user. The alert() function has two significant UI issues:
name: jNotify
